      • waitForCardAbsent

        public boolean waitForCardAbsent(long timeout)
        Waits until a card is absent in this reader or the timeout expires. If the method returns due to an expired timeout, it returns false. Otherwise it return true.
        Parameters:
        timeout -
        Returns:
